original: bzhi par skyes pa'i gzhan gyi sa pa'i gzugs rnams ni 'og ma dag kho na yin gyi gong ma dag ni yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: bzhi par skyes pa'i gzhan gyi sa pa'i gzugs rnams ni 'og ma dag kho na yin gyi gong ma dag ni yod pa ma yin no //
translated: Form of other levels that is born in the fourth absorption is only lower levels, it is not higher levels.

original: ci rigs par sbyar bar bya'o zhes bya ba 'byung ba ste /
analyzed: ci rigs par sbyar bar bya'o zhes bya ba 'byung ba ste /
translated: They should be applied as appropriate.

original: de la rigs pa ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: de la rigs pa ni 'di yin te /
translated: The reasoning is as follows.

original: bsam gtan gnyis par skyes pa la 'dod par gtogs pa dang bsam gtan dang po'i sa pa'i mig med kyi rang gi sa pa'i mig gis rang dang 'og ma'i gzugs la lta ste gong ma dag la ni ma yin no //
analyzed: bsam gtan gnyis par skyes pa la 'dod par gtogs pa dang bsam gtan dang po'i sa pa'i mig med kyi rang gi sa pa'i mig gis rang dang 'og ma'i gzugs la lta ste gong ma dag la ni ma yin no //
translated: Beings born in the second absorption do not have eyes belonging to the desire realm or the first absorption. They see form of their level and lower levels with eyes of their level, but not higher levels.

original: bsam gtan gsum pa'i sa pas ni /
analyzed: bsam gtan gsum pa'i sa pas ni /
translated: Eyes of the third absorption

original: bsam gtan bzhi pa'i gzugs ma gtogs pa'i gzugs rnams la lta'o //
analyzed: bsam gtan bzhi pa'i gzugs ma gtogs pa'i gzugs rnams la lta'o //
translated: see form except for form of the fourth absorption.

original: bsam gtan bzhi pa'i mig gis ni gzugs thams cad la lta'o //
analyzed: bsam gtan bzhi pa'i mig gis ni gzugs thams cad la lta'o //
translated: Eyes of the fourth absorption see all form.

original: de lta na bsam gtan gsum pa dang bzhi par skyes pa rnams la ni sa 'og ma'i mig med kyi /
analyzed: de lta na bsam gtan gsum pa dang bzhi par skyes pa rnams la ni sa 'og ma'i mig med kyi /
translated: Thus those born in the third and fourth absorptions do not have eyes of lower levels.

original: rang gi sa pa'i mig gis rang gi sa pa dang sa 'og ma'i gzugs la lta ste /
analyzed: rang gi sa pa'i mig gis rang gi sa pa dang sa 'og ma'i gzugs la lta ste /
translated: They see form of their level and lower levels with eyes of their level.

original: sa gong ma la ni ma yin no //üîΩlus la 'og ma'i mig ma @136b yin ;
analyzed: sa gong ma la ni ma yin no // lus la 'og ma'i mig ma @136b yin ;
translated: But it is not so in higher levels.

original: / zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: / zhes bya ba la /
translated: The eyes of lower level are not in the body of higher level.

original: 'og ma bkag pas rang gi sa pa dang / sa gong ma pa gnang bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'og ma bkag pas rang gi sa pa dang / sa gong ma pa gnang bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Since lower is negated, those of one's own level and higher levels are allowed.

original: 'di ltar sa gong ma'i lus las 'og ma pa'i mig rnam par smin pa las skyes pa mi rigs te /
analyzed: 'di ltar sa gong ma'i lus las 'og ma pa'i mig rnam par smin pa las skyes pa mi rigs te /
translated: It is not logical that eyes arisen from the karmic maturation of lower level are in the body of higher level,

original: sa 'og ma pa'i rnam par smin pa'i rgyus gong ma'i 'bras bu mi 'byin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sa 'og ma pa'i rnam par smin pa'i rgyus gong ma'i 'bras bu mi 'byin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the cause of karmic maturation of lower level does not produce the result of higher level.

original: rgyas pa las byung ba yang mi rung ste /
analyzed: rgyas pa las byung ba yang mi rung ste /
translated: It is also illogical that they arise from enhancement,

original: sa 'og ma pa'i rgyas pa'i rgyu med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sa 'og ma pa'i rgyas pa'i rgyu med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because there is no cause of enhancement of lower level.

original: lus dang mig dang gzugs rnams ni gzugs kyi rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir dang / bsam gtan bzhi pa'i gong na gzugs med pa'i phyir sa lnga pa kho na yin gyi /
analyzed: lus dang mig dang gzugs rnams ni gzugs kyi rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir dang / bsam gtan bzhi pa'i gong na gzugs med pa'i phyir sa lnga pa kho na yin gyi /
translated: Since body, eyes, and form are by nature form, and since there is no form above the fourth absorption, they exist on five levels alone.

original: sa gong ma dag na ni med do //
analyzed: sa gong ma dag na ni med do //
translated: But they do not exist on higher levels.

original: mig gi rnam par shes pa ni sa gnyis pa ste zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: mig gi rnam par shes pa ni sa gnyis pa ste zhes bya ba la /
translated: Eye consciousness exists on two levels.

original: 'dod pa'i khams dang bsam gtan dang po na yod kyi gong na ni yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: 'dod pa'i khams dang bsam gtan dang po na yod kyi gong na ni yod pa ma yin te /
translated: It exists in the desire realm and the first absorption, but not in higher levels.

original: rtog pa dang bcas shing dpyod pa dang bcas pa'i phyir dang / bsam gtan gnyis pa la sogs pa dag na rtog pa dang dpyod pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rtog pa dang bcas shing dpyod pa dang bcas pa'i phyir dang / bsam gtan gnyis pa la sogs pa dag na rtog pa dang dpyod pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because those levels have investigation and analysis, and because there is no investigation and analysis in the second absorption and so on.

original: mig gis gong ma'i gzugs ma yin //
analyzed: mig gis gong ma'i gzugs ma yin //
translated: The eye does not see form of a higher level.

original: zhes bya ba la gong ma bkag pas rang gi sa pa dang sa 'og ma khas blangs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la gong ma bkag pas rang gi sa pa dang sa 'og ma khas blangs par 'gyur ro //
translated: Since higher levels are negated, it is accepted that the eye sees form of its own level and lower levels.

original: yang ci'i phyir mig gong ma'i yul can du mi 'dod ce na /
analyzed: yang ci'i phyir mig gong ma'i yul can du mi 'dod ce na /
translated: Why is it not accepted that the eye is the sense faculty of a higher level?

original: sa 'og ma'i mig ni yul rags ba la 'tsham pa'i phyir sa 'og ma'i gzugs phra mo la lta ba'i nus pa med do //
analyzed: sa 'og ma'i mig ni yul rags ba la 'tsham pa'i phyir sa 'og ma'i gzugs phra mo la lta ba'i nus pa med do //
translated: Because the eye of a lower level is not capable of seeing subtle form of a lower level, since it is suitable for a coarse object.

original: rnam par shes pa'ang gong ma ni mig gi ma yin te /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'ang gong ma ni mig gi ma yin te /
translated: Also, consciousness of a higher level is not of the eye.

original: zhes bya ba 'dir yang rang gi sa pa dang sa 'og ma pa khas blangs par 'gyur te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba 'dir yang rang gi sa pa dang sa 'og ma pa khas blangs par 'gyur te /
translated: Here too, it is accepted that the eye is of its own level and a lower level.

original: ji ltar sa gong ma'i gzugs sa 'og ma'i mig gi yul ma yin ba de bzhin du /
analyzed: ji ltar sa gong ma'i gzugs sa 'og ma'i mig gi yul ma yin ba de bzhin du /
translated: Just as the form of higher levels is not the object of the eye sense faculty of lower levels,

original: sa 'og ma pa'i rnam par shes pa yangs 'og ma ba'i mig gis brten par mi 'gyur te rang rten dang lhan cig yul gcig la 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sa 'og ma pa'i rnam par shes pa yangs 'og ma ba'i mig gis brten par mi 'gyur te rang rten dang lhan cig yul gcig la 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
translated: so too the consciousness of lower levels does not depend on the eye sense faculty of higher levels, because the object and the support of consciousness engage their object simultaneously.

original: 'di ni lha tshangs pa la sogs pa mthong ba'i phyir dang / de'i dbang gis rnam par shes pa skye ba'i phyir 'di ni dpyad par bya dgos so zhes bya ba 'di ni rgol ba'i gzhi yin no zhe na /
analyzed: 'di ni lha tshangs pa la sogs pa mthong ba'i phyir dang / de'i dbang gis rnam par shes pa skye ba'i phyir 'di ni dpyad par bya dgos so zhes bya ba 'di ni rgol ba'i gzhi yin no zhe na /
translated: This is a basis for debate because it is said that this must be investigated because the form of Brahma and so on is seen and because consciousness arises by the power of Brahma.

original: sprul ba'i gzugs mthong ba'i phyir na 'di ni dpyad zin to //
analyzed: sprul ba'i gzugs mthong ba'i phyir na 'di ni dpyad zin to //
translated: This has already been investigated because the form of emanation is seen.

original: de'i gzugs lus kyi 'ang gnyi ga thams cad du //üîΩzhes bya ba la /
analyzed: de'i gzugs lus kyi 'ang gnyi ga thams cad du // zhes bya ba la /
translated: The form of that is the body and both are everywhere.

original: de'i zhes bya ba ni bshad ma thag pa'i mig gi rnam par shes pa'i yul ni thams cad du rang dang 'og dang gong ma'i sa pa'i gzugs yin la /
analyzed: de'i zhes bya ba ni bshad ma thag pa'i mig gi rnam par shes pa'i yul ni thams cad du rang dang 'og dang gong ma'i sa pa'i gzugs yin la /
translated: The object of the eye consciousness just explained is the form of all levels, its own level, lower levels and higher levels.

original: lus kyi'ang gzugs dang rnam par shes pa dag @137a * //
analyzed: lus kyi'ang gzugs dang rnam par shes pa dag @137a * //
translated: Also, the body is form and consciousness.üîΩ

original: gnyi ga rang dang 'og dang gong ma'i sa pa dag thams cad du yin no //
analyzed: gnyi ga rang dang 'og dang gong ma'i sa pa dag thams cad du yin no //
translated: Also, the body and form belong to the same level, a lower level, or a higher level.

original: de la rnam par shes pa'i rang gi sa pa'i gzugs ni rang gi rnam par shes pas rnam par shes pa'i 'dod pa dag bsam gtan dang po'i gzugs so //
analyzed: de la rnam par shes pa'i rang gi sa pa'i gzugs ni rang gi rnam par shes pas rnam par shes pa'i 'dod pa dag bsam gtan dang po'i gzugs so //
translated: The form of the consciousness of the desire realm is the form of the first absorption.

original: bsam gtan dang po'i rnam par shes pa'i gong ma ni sa pa'i bsam gtan gnyis pa la sogs pa'i gzugs so //
analyzed: bsam gtan dang po'i rnam par shes pa'i gong ma ni sa pa'i bsam gtan gnyis pa la sogs pa'i gzugs so //
translated: The form of the consciousness of the first absorption is the form of the second absorption and so on.

original: sa 'og ma pa ni 'dod pa'i gzugs so //
analyzed: sa 'og ma pa ni 'dod pa'i gzugs so //
translated: The form of the consciousness of the lower level is the form of the desire realm.

original: lus dang gzugs dang rnam par shes pa rang gi sa pa dag ni 'dod pa dang bsam gtan dang por skyes pa'i'o //
analyzed: lus dang gzugs dang rnam par shes pa rang gi sa pa dag ni 'dod pa dang bsam gtan dang por skyes pa'i'o //
translated: The body, form, and consciousness of the same level are those of one born in the desire realm and the first absorption.

original: sa 'og ma pa dag ni bsam gtan gnyis pa la sogs par skyes pa'i 'o ;
analyzed: sa 'og ma pa dag ni bsam gtan gnyis pa la sogs par skyes pa'i 'o ;
translated: Those of the lower level are those of one born in the second absorption and so on.

original: / sa gong ma pa dag ni 'dod pa'i khams su skyes pa kho na'i'o //
analyzed: / sa gong ma pa dag ni 'dod pa'i khams su skyes pa kho na'i'o //
translated: Those of the higher level are those of one born in the desire realm.

original: lus dang gzugs kyang rang dang 'og ma'i sa pa'o //
analyzed: lus dang gzugs kyang rang dang 'og ma'i sa pa'o //
translated: The body and form belong to the same level or a lower level.

original: gong ma'i mig gi yul gong ma dang rang dang 'og ma'i sa pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: gong ma'i mig gi yul gong ma dang rang dang 'og ma'i sa pa zhes bya'o //
translated: The eye sense faculty of a higher stage is the domain of the eye sense faculty of the same stage and of a lower stage.

original: gsum dag ni zhes bya ba rgya cher 'byung ste /
analyzed: gsum dag ni zhes bya ba rgya cher 'byung ste /
translated: The three are of their own stage,

original: yul dang phrad pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yul dang phrad pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because they are in contact with their object-field.

original: lus dang dbang po dang yul gyi bdag nyid can gsum char gdon mi za bar rang gi sa pa yin gyi /
analyzed: lus dang dbang po dang yul gyi bdag nyid can gsum char gdon mi za bar rang gi sa pa yin gyi /
translated: The three, which are the body, sense faculty, and object-field, are necessarily of the same stage.

original: rnam par shes pa la ni bye brag yod do //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa la ni bye brag yod do //
translated: But consciousness is not always of the same stage.

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: In fact:

original: 'dod pa'i khams dang zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: 'dod pa'i khams dang zhes bya ba la /
translated: In the realm of desire,

original: lus la sogs pa bzhin rnam par shes pa yang de'i sa pa nyid do //
analyzed: lus la sogs pa bzhin rnam par shes pa yang de'i sa pa nyid do //
translated: consciousness is of the same stage as the body, etc.

original: lus dang reg bya dang dbang po ni sa lnga pa yin la /
analyzed: lus dang reg bya dang dbang po ni sa lnga pa yin la /
translated: The body, the tangible and the body consciousness are of five stages.

original: lus kyi rnam par shes pa ni sa gnyis pa yin pa de'i phyir 'di la dbye ba yod do //
analyzed: lus kyi rnam par shes pa ni sa gnyis pa yin pa de'i phyir 'di la dbye ba yod do //
translated: The body consciousness is of two stages.

original: yid ni ma nges te zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: yid ni ma nges te zhes bya ba la /
translated: The mental faculty is not determined.üîΩThe mental faculty is of the same stage as the body, etc.

original: re zhig mtshungs pa'i sa pa ni sa lnga po dag tu skyes pa gang yin pa'i rang gi sa pa bzhi po kho na yin no //
analyzed: re zhig mtshungs pa'i sa pa ni sa lnga po dag tu skyes pa gang yin pa'i rang gi sa pa bzhi po kho na yin no //
translated: The mental faculty is of the same stage as the body, etc.üîΩThe mental faculty is of the same stage as the body, etc.üîΩThe mental faculty is of the same stage as the body, etc.üîΩThe mental faculty is of the same stage as the body, etc.üîΩThe mental faculty is of the same stage as the body, etc.üîΩThe mental faculty is of the same stage as the body, etc.üîΩThe mental faculty is of the same stage as the body, etc.üîΩThe mental faculty is of the same stage as the body, etc.üîΩThe mental faculty is of the same stage as the body, etc.üîΩThe mental faculty is of the same stage as the body, etc.üîΩThe mental faculty is of the same stage as the body, etc.üîΩThe mental faculty is of the same stage as the body, etc.üîΩThe mental faculty is of the same stage as the body, etc.üîΩThe mental faculty is of the same stage as the body, etc.üîΩThe mental faculty is of the same stage as the body, etc.üîΩThe mental faculty is of the same stage as the body, etc.üîΩThe mental faculty is of the same stage as the body, etc.üîΩThe mental faculty is of the same stage as the body, etc.üîΩThe mental faculty is of the same stage as the body, etc.üîΩThe mental faculty is of the same stage as the body, etc.üîΩThe mental faculty is of the same stage as the body, etc.üîΩThe mental faculty is of the same stage as the body, etc.üîΩThe mental faculty is of the same stage as the body, etc.üîΩThe mental faculty is of the same stage as the body, etc

original: snyoms par 'jug pa dang skye ba'i tshe zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: snyoms par 'jug pa dang skye ba'i tshe zhes bya ba la /
translated: At the time of entering meditative attainment and birth.

original: de la snyoms par 'jug pa'i tshe yid sa gong ma yin pa ni /
analyzed: de la snyoms par 'jug pa'i tshe yid sa gong ma yin pa ni /
translated: At the time of entering meditative attainment, the mind is higher.

original: gang gi tshe 'dod pa'i khams su skyes pa zhig bsam gtan dang po'i mjug thogs su 'dod pa na spyod pa'i yid kyi rnam par shes pas 'dod pa na spyod pa'i chos rnams shes pa ste /
analyzed: gang gi tshe 'dod pa'i khams su skyes pa zhig bsam gtan dang po'i mjug thogs su 'dod pa na spyod pa'i yid kyi rnam par shes pas 'dod pa na spyod pa'i chos rnams shes pa ste /
translated: When one born in the desire realm comprehends desire realm phenomena with desire realm mental consciousness immediately after the first absorption,

original: de'i tshe yid ni sa gong ma yin la /
analyzed: de'i tshe yid ni sa gong ma yin la /
translated: at that time the mind is higher.

original: lus dang yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang chos rnams ni sa 'og ma pa yin no //
analyzed: lus dang yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang chos rnams ni sa 'og ma pa yin no //
translated: But the body, mental consciousness and phenomena are lower.

original: bsam gtan gnyis pa'am bzhi pa'i mjug thogs su bsam gtan dang po dang gnyis pa dang gsum pa'i sa pa'i yid kyi rnam par shes pas bsam gtan dang po dang gnyis pa dang gsum pa'i sa pa'i chos rnams @137b rnam par shes pa na /
analyzed: bsam gtan gnyis pa'am bzhi pa'i mjug thogs su bsam gtan dang po dang gnyis pa dang gsum pa'i sa pa'i yid kyi rnam par shes pas bsam gtan dang po dang gnyis pa dang gsum pa'i sa pa'i chos rnams @137b rnam par shes pa na /
translated: When one comprehends phenomena of the first, second and third absorptions with mental consciousness of the second or fourth absorptions,

original: de'i yid ni sa gong ma pa yin la /
analyzed: de'i yid ni sa gong ma pa yin la /
translated: at that time the mind is higher.

original: gsum ni sa 'og ma pa yin no //
analyzed: gsum ni sa 'og ma pa yin no //
translated: But the three are lower.

original: bsam gtan dang por skyes pa zhig gis bsam gtan gnyis pa'i mjug thogs su bsam gtan dang po'i yid kyi rnam par shes pas bsam gtan dang po'i sa pa'i chos rnams shes pa na /
analyzed: bsam gtan dang por skyes pa zhig gis bsam gtan gnyis pa'i mjug thogs su bsam gtan dang po'i yid kyi rnam par shes pas bsam gtan dang po'i sa pa'i chos rnams shes pa na /
translated: When one born in the first absorption cognizes phenomena of the first absorption level with the mental consciousness of the first absorption immediately after the second absorption,

original: yid kyi gong ma'i sa pa yin la /
analyzed: yid kyi gong ma'i sa pa yin la /
translated: the mental faculty is of a higher level.

original: gsum ni 'og ma'i sa pa nyid do //
analyzed: gsum ni 'og ma'i sa pa nyid do //
translated: The other three are of the lower level.

original: bsam gtan gsum pa dang bzhi pa'i mjug thogs su bsam gtan gnyis pa dang gsum pa'i sa pa'i yid kyi rnam par shes pas bsam gtan gnyis pa dang gsum pa'i sa pa'i chos rnam par shes pa ni /
analyzed: bsam gtan gsum pa dang bzhi pa'i mjug thogs su bsam gtan gnyis pa dang gsum pa'i sa pa'i yid kyi rnam par shes pas bsam gtan gnyis pa dang gsum pa'i sa pa'i chos rnam par shes pa ni /
translated: When the mental consciousness of the second and third absorptions cognizes phenomena of the second and third absorptions immediately after the third and fourth absorptions,

original: yid ni gong ma'i sa pa yin la /
analyzed: yid ni gong ma'i sa pa yin la /
translated: the mental faculty is of a higher level.

original: gsum ni 'og ma'i sa pa nyid do //
analyzed: gsum ni 'og ma'i sa pa nyid do //
translated: The other three are of the lower level.

original: bsam gtan gnyis pa la sogs par skyes pa yang ji ltar rigs par brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: bsam gtan gnyis pa la sogs par skyes pa yang ji ltar rigs par brjod par bya'o //
translated: One born in the third absorption and so on should be explained in the same way.

original: 'dod pa'i khams su skyes pa 'dod par gtogs pa'i sprul ba sprul bar byed pa na /
analyzed: 'dod pa'i khams su skyes pa 'dod par gtogs pa'i sprul ba sprul bar byed pa na /
translated: When one born in the desire realm emanates desire realm emanations,

original: yid ni ci rigs par bsam gtan bzhi ba'i sa pa yin la /
analyzed: yid ni ci rigs par bsam gtan bzhi ba'i sa pa yin la /
translated: the mental faculty is of the fourth absorption level.

original: gsum ni 'dod par gtogs pa'o //
analyzed: gsum ni 'dod par gtogs pa'o //
translated: Three are of the desire realm.

original: lus 'dod pa'i khams su skyes pa ni /
analyzed: lus 'dod pa'i khams su skyes pa ni /
translated: One born in the desire realm

original: yid sa 'og ma pa'o //
analyzed: yid sa 'og ma pa'o //
translated: has a lower mental faculty.

original: de'i phyir sngar thod rgal gyi bsam gtan gyi snyoms par 'jug pa la sa gong ma pa'i yid dang rnam par shes pa dang chos rnams ji ltar srid pa'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir sngar thod rgal gyi bsam gtan gyi snyoms par 'jug pa la sa gong ma pa'i yid dang rnam par shes pa dang chos rnams ji ltar srid pa'o //
translated: Therefore, when entering meditative attainment of alternating dhyƒÅna, the mental faculty, consciousness, and phenomena of higher levels are as they are in the forward order.

original: 'dod par gtogs pa'i sprul pa sdud pa'i tshe yang yid ni sa 'og ma pa dang / lus ni rang gi sa pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa sa gong ma ba dang / chos ni ji ltar srid pa'o //
analyzed: 'dod par gtogs pa'i sprul pa sdud pa'i tshe yang yid ni sa 'og ma pa dang / lus ni rang gi sa pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa sa gong ma ba dang / chos ni ji ltar srid pa'o //
translated: When one born in the desire realm manifests emanations of the desire realm, the mental faculty is of a lower level, the body is of its own level, the mental consciousness is of a higher level, and phenomena are as they are in the forward order.

original: skye ba'i tshe yang sa gong ma yin la /
analyzed: skye ba'i tshe yang sa gong ma yin la /
translated: When one is born in a higher level, the body is of its own level.

original: lus sa 'og ma par mi rung ste /
analyzed: lus sa 'og ma par mi rung ste /
translated: It is illogical for the body to be of a lower level.

original: sa 'og ma pa'i lus kyi dbang po mi 'gags par 'ga' yang skye bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sa 'og ma pa'i lus kyi dbang po mi 'gags par 'ga' yang skye bar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Because no one is born without the cessation of the body sense faculty of a lower level.

original: 'ga' zhig ni ma yin yang rigs mi mthun pa'i sems la gnas te dus byed do //
analyzed: 'ga' zhig ni ma yin yang rigs mi mthun pa'i sems la gnas te dus byed do //
translated: Some who are born in a higher level and who are not of the uncontaminated class die with a mind of a different type.

original: de ltar sa gong ma lus las 'og ma pa'i yid med pas aa ba s'ang byam sa gong ma pa'i yid sa 'og ma pa'i lus la mi 'thad do //
analyzed: de ltar sa gong ma lus las 'og ma pa'i yid med pas aa ba s'ang byam sa gong ma pa'i yid sa 'og ma pa'i lus la mi 'thad do //
translated: Thus, since the mental faculty of a lower level does not exist in the body of a higher level, the mental faculty of a higher level is untenable in the body of a lower level.

original: gang zhig sa gong ma pa'i rnam par shes pa'i mjug thogs su 'dod pa dang gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i khams su nyid (rgya dpe gcig gi lugs 'dod pa'i khams su nying mtshams sbyar zhes pa snang/) mtshams sbyor ba na /
analyzed: gang zhig sa gong ma pa'i rnam par shes pa'i mjug thogs su 'dod pa dang gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i khams su nyid (rgya dpe gcig gi lugs 'dod pa'i khams su nying mtshams sbyar zhes pa snang/) mtshams sbyor ba na /
translated: When one who has a consciousness of a higher level links at death to the desire realm, the form realm, or the formless realm,

original: de'i yid ni sa gong ma pa yin la /
analyzed: de'i yid ni sa gong ma pa yin la /
translated: his mental faculty is of a higher level.

original: lus dang yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni sa 'og ma pa yin no //
analyzed: lus dang yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni sa 'og ma pa yin no //
translated: His body and mental consciousness are of a lower level.

original: chos rnams ni de'i sa pa dang / sa gong ma pa dang mi @138a * //
analyzed: chos rnams ni de'i sa pa dang / sa gong ma pa dang mi @138a * //
translated: The phenomena that are possessed are of his level or a higher level.

original: ldan pa dag yin no //üîΩde bzhin du yang sa 'og ma pa ma yin la /
analyzed: ldan pa dag yin no // de bzhin du yang sa 'og ma pa ma yin la /
translated: They are not of a lower level.

original: lus sa gong ma pa yin pa yang brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: lus sa gong ma pa yin pa yang brjod par bya'o //
translated: Similarly, it should be stated that the body is of a higher level but not the mental faculty.

original: snyoms par 'jug pa'i dus su lus sa gong ma pa dang yid sa 'og ma pa rung ste /
analyzed: snyoms par 'jug pa'i dus su lus sa gong ma pa dang yid sa 'og ma pa rung ste /
translated: When entering meditative attainment, it is possible that the body is of a higher level but the mental faculty is of a lower level.

original: rnam par shes pa dang lus sprul pa'i sems kyis mngon du byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa dang lus sprul pa'i sems kyis mngon du byed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the mind that emanates consciousness and body manifests them.

original: de bzhin du yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang chos la yang brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang chos la yang brjod par bya'o //
translated: The same should be said of mental consciousness and its object field.

original: rgyas par snyoms 'jug bstan pa las zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /
analyzed: rgyas par snyoms 'jug bstan pa las zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /
translated: The extensive explanation is as follows:

original: zag pa med pa'i mjug thogs su //
analyzed: zag pa med pa'i mjug thogs su //
translated: From the uncontaminated,üîΩvirtuous minds of the three realms arise.

original: ltag 'og gsum pa'i bar dge ba //üîΩskye bo dag pa las de bzhin //
analyzed: ltag 'og gsum pa'i bar dge ba // skye bo dag pa las de bzhin //
translated: From pure minds of its level,

original: rang gi sa pa'i nyon mongs kyang //
analyzed: rang gi sa pa'i nyon mongs kyang //
translated: afflicted minds of its level arise.üîΩFrom afflicted minds, pure and afflicted minds of its level arise.

original: nyon mongs can las rang dag dang // nyon mongs 'og ma'i dag gcig kyang //
analyzed: nyon mongs can las rang dag dang // nyon mongs 'og ma'i dag gcig kyang //
translated: From afflicted minds, pure minds of lower levels arise.

original: 'chi 'pho dag la nyon mongs kun //
analyzed: 'chi 'pho dag la nyon mongs kun //
translated: At death, all afflicted minds arise from pure minds.üîΩFrom afflicted minds, pure minds of higher levels do not arise.üîΩFrom pure minds, three minds of its level arise.üîΩFrom pure minds, three minds of its level arise.üîΩFrom afflicted minds, three minds of its level arise.üîΩFrom afflicted minds, one pure mind of a lower level arises.üîΩFrom afflicted minds, all afflicted minds arise.

original: nyon mongs can la gong ma min //
analyzed: nyon mongs can la gong ma min //
translated: From afflicted minds, pure minds of higher levels do not arise.üîΩFrom pure minds, three minds of its level arise.üîΩFrom pure minds, three minds of its level arise.

original: zhes bya ba dang / rigs mi mthun pa'i gsum par 'gro //
analyzed: zhes bya ba dang / rigs mi mthun pa'i gsum par 'gro //
translated: From afflicted minds, three minds of its level arise.

original: thod rgal gyi ni snyoms 'jug yin //
analyzed: thod rgal gyi ni snyoms 'jug yin //
translated: From afflicted minds, one pure mind of a lower level arises.üîΩFrom afflicted minds, all afflicted minds arise.üîΩFrom afflicted minds, pure minds of higher levels do not arise.üîΩFrom pure minds, three minds of its level arise.üîΩFrom pure minds, three minds of its level arise.

original: zhes bya pa de lta bu la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya pa de lta bu la sogs pa'o //
translated: From afflicted minds, three minds of its level arise.

original: zhar las 'ongs pa'i skabs zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: zhar las 'ongs pa'i skabs zhes bya ba la /
translated: From afflicted minds, one pure mind of a lower level arises.üîΩFrom afflicted minds, all afflicted minds arise.üîΩFrom afflicted minds, pure minds of higher levels do not arise.üîΩFrom pure minds, three minds of its level arise.üîΩFrom pure minds, three minds of its level arise.üîΩFrom afflicted minds, three minds of its level arise.üîΩFrom afflicted minds, one pure mind of a lower level arises.üîΩFrom afflicted minds, all afflicted minds arise.üîΩFrom afflicted minds, pure minds of higher levels do not arise.üîΩFrom pure minds, three minds of its level arise.

original: zhar las 'ongs pa ni zhar las byung ba ste /
analyzed: zhar las 'ongs pa ni zhar las byung ba ste /
translated: From pure minds, three minds of its level arise.

original: lus gang la gnas te zhes bya la sogs pa 'di ni mig gis gzugs rnams mthong zhes bya ba de las 'ongs pa yin no //üîΩgnyis kyis rnam shes phyi yi lnga ;
analyzed: lus gang la gnas te zhes bya la sogs pa 'di ni mig gis gzugs rnams mthong zhes bya ba de las 'ongs pa yin no // gnyis kyis rnam shes phyi yi lnga ;
translated: The phrase ‚Äúin dependence upon which eye sense-faculty does one see visible form?‚Äù is a reference to the statement ‚Äúthe eye sense-faculty sees visible form.‚Äù

original: zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la /
translated: The five external sense-spheres are known by means of two.

original: lnga zhes bya ba ni chos kyi khams bsal bar bya ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: lnga zhes bya ba ni chos kyi khams bsal bar bya ba'i phyir ro //
translated: The word ‚Äúfive‚Äù is used in order to exclude the element of mental objects.

original: phyi'i zhes bya ba ni mig la sogs pa bsal bar bya ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: phyi'i zhes bya ba ni mig la sogs pa bsal bar bya ba'i phyir ro //
translated: The word ‚Äúexternal‚Äù is used in order to exclude the eye sense-faculty, etc.

original: phyi'i lnga po kho na gnyis kyis shes par bya ba yin no zhes nges par gzung pas lhag ma bcu gsum ni rnam par shes pa gcig gi yul yin no zhes bya bar grub par 'gyur te /
analyzed: phyi'i lnga po kho na gnyis kyis shes par bya ba yin no zhes nges par gzung pas lhag ma bcu gsum ni rnam par shes pa gcig gi yul yin no zhes bya bar grub par 'gyur te /
translated: Since it is stated that the five external sense-spheres are known by means of two, it is established that the remaining thirteen are the objects of a single consciousness,

original: lnga po rnams kyi yul ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: lnga po rnams kyi yul ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because they are not the objects of the five.

original: 'dus ma byas ni rtag pa kho na'o zhes nges par gzung bas chos kyi khams kyi phyogs gcig rtag go //
analyzed: 'dus ma byas ni rtag pa kho na'o zhes nges par gzung bas chos kyi khams kyi phyogs gcig rtag go //
translated: Since it is stated that the unconditioned is permanent, one part of the element of mental objects is permanent.

original: lhag ma rnams dang / chos kyi khams kyi phyogs gcig ni mi rtag go zhes bya bar shes par byas par 'gyur ro //üîΩma bsgribs pa dang bsgribs pa dag phan tshun 'gal ba la sa dy'a k'a (nam mkha'i ldan pa bskyed pa 'gog pa yang 'dod do zhes so//) sha sy'a sam yo go tb'a da ni ro dhe tsi ti so sor brtags pa dang so sor brtags pa ma yin
analyzed: lhag ma rnams dang / chos kyi khams kyi phyogs gcig ni mi rtag go zhes bya bar shes par byas par 'gyur ro // ma bsgribs pa dang bsgribs pa dag phan tshun 'gal ba la sa dy'a k'a (nam mkha'i ldan pa bskyed pa 'gog pa yang 'dod do zhes so//) sha sy'a sam yo go tb'a da ni ro dhe tsi ti so sor brtags pa dang so sor brtags pa ma yin
translated: The rest and one part of the element of mental objects are impermanent.üîΩThe unobscured and the obscured are mutually exclusive.

original: pa'i 'gog pa dag rtag pa nyid la rnam par dpyad par bya'o zhes @138b bya ba rgol ba'i gzhi'o //
analyzed: pa'i 'gog pa dag rtag pa nyid la rnam par dpyad par bya'o zhes @138b bya ba rgol ba'i gzhi'o //
translated: The opponent‚Äôs position is stated: ‚ÄúThe two cessations, that is, the cessation through deliberation and the cessation not through deliberation, should be examined as to whether they are permanent or not.‚Äù

original: sgrib pa med pas nam mkha' med na'o na ci gang gi tshe sgrib pa las bzlog pa'i chos gzhan gang du don dang bcas pa'i go skabs la sgrib par byed pa de'i tshe nam mkha' gang la gzugs kyi skabs su 'gyur /
analyzed: sgrib pa med pas nam mkha' med na'o na ci gang gi tshe sgrib pa las bzlog pa'i chos gzhan gang du don dang bcas pa'i go skabs la sgrib par byed pa de'i tshe nam mkha' gang la gzugs kyi skabs su 'gyur /
translated: If there is no space because there is no obstruction, then when there is an opportunity for the occurrence of an object, which is the opposite of obstruction, at that time, where is space, where is the opportunity for form?

original: 'dis ni tshor ba la sogs pa rnams las bye brag tu bshad do //
analyzed: 'dis ni tshor ba la sogs pa rnams las bye brag tu bshad do //
translated: This is the distinction from feeling, etc.

original: ji ltar yang rtsig pa la sogs pa la sor mo la sogs pa'i gzugs kyi skabs su 'gyur /
analyzed: ji ltar yang rtsig pa la sogs pa la sor mo la sogs pa'i gzugs kyi skabs su 'gyur /
translated: In any case, space would be the occasion for the form of the finger, etc., in the space of the wall, etc.

original: de la nam mkha' yod pa ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: de la nam mkha' yod pa ma yin no zhe na /
translated: If you say that space does not exist there,

original: 'di ni de lta ma yin te /
analyzed: 'di ni de lta ma yin te /
translated: that is not so,

original: rtsig pa la sogs pa thogs pa der sor mo la sogs pa'i gzugs kyi skabs su 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rtsig pa la sogs pa thogs pa der sor mo la sogs pa'i gzugs kyi skabs su 'gyur ro //
translated: because the form of the finger, etc., is the occasion for the obstruction of the wall, etc.

original: gal te de yang nam mkhar 'gyur na /
analyzed: gal te de yang nam mkhar 'gyur na /
translated: If that is space,

original: re zhig rtsig pa la sogs pa'i gzugs de nyid ga la gnas par 'gyur /
analyzed: re zhig rtsig pa la sogs pa'i gzugs de nyid ga la gnas par 'gyur /
translated: then where is the form of the wall, etc.?

original: 'di ni gang 'thug pa la de'i glags med do zhes 'thug pa la de med par rtog pa yang bkag go //
analyzed: 'di ni gang 'thug pa la de'i glags med do zhes 'thug pa la de med par rtog pa yang bkag go //
translated: This also refutes the idea that space is the absence of the tangible in the interstices of the tangible.

original: phrad pa 'jig pa dang phrad pa skyed pa skyed pa tsam ni bral ba ma yin no //
analyzed: phrad pa 'jig pa dang phrad pa skyed pa skyed pa tsam ni bral ba ma yin no //
translated: The mere production of the arising of contact and the destruction of the ceasing of contact is not separation.

original: gang zhig ma byung ba las byung ba dang byung ba nas med pa ni mi rtag par 'gyur na /
analyzed: gang zhig ma byung ba las byung ba dang byung ba nas med pa ni mi rtag par 'gyur na /
translated: Whatever is produced from what is non-existent and is non-existent after having existed is impermanent.

original: 'o na ci zhe na phrad pa las bzlog pa'i chos kyang phrad pa bandha: sam yo dzan ma nu sha ya na ma ta sta ta thob par byed pa'i mtshan nyid dang bral ba'i thob pa gang yin pa thob bo //
analyzed: 'o na ci zhe na phrad pa las bzlog pa'i chos kyang phrad pa bandha: sam yo dzan ma nu sha ya na ma ta sta ta thob par byed pa'i mtshan nyid dang bral ba'i thob pa gang yin pa thob bo //
translated: What is it? It is the possession of the non-analytical cessation, which is the mere non-arising of future dharmas, the dharma that is the permanent obstruction to the arising of that which is free from contact.üîΩThe possession of that which is free from contact is the possession of the non-analytical cessation, which is the mere non-arising of future dharmas, the dharma that is the permanent obstruction to the arising of that which is free from contact.üîΩThe possession of that which is free from contact is the possession of the non-analytical cessation, which is the mere non-arising of future dharmas, the dharma that is the permanent obstruction to the arising of that which is free from contact.

original: phrad pa dang bral ba 'di las so sor brtags pa ma yin pa'i 'gog pas ma 'ongs pa'i chos mi skye ba tsam skye ba la gtan du gegs byed pa'i chos gang yin pa thob po /üîΩ(/'ching ba dang kun sbyor dang phra rgyas so //üîΩde'i phyir/) 'di ni nam yang skye bar mi 'gyur to //üîΩ'dus byas kyang rtag tu rang gi mtshan nyid kyis gnas pa'i phyir ro //üîΩji ltar 'dus ma byas kho na rtag pa yin zhe na dus su rgyu ba med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: phrad pa dang bral ba 'di las so sor brtags pa ma yin pa'i 'gog pas ma 'ongs pa'i chos mi skye ba tsam skye ba la gtan du gegs byed pa'i chos gang yin pa thob po / (/'ching ba dang kun sbyor dang phra rgyas so // de'i phyir/) 'di ni nam yang skye bar mi 'gyur to // 'dus byas kyang rtag tu rang gi mtshan nyid kyis gnas pa'i phyir ro // ji ltar 'dus ma byas kho na rtag pa yin zhe na dus su rgyu ba med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The possession of that which is free from contact is the possession of the non-analytical cessation, which is the mere non-arising of future dharmas, the dharma that is the permanent obstruction to the arising of that which is free from contact.üîΩThe possession of that which is free from contact is the possession of the non-analytical cessation, which is the mere non-arising of future dharmas, the dharma that is the permanent obstruction to the arising of that which is free from contact.üîΩThe possession of that which is free from contact is the possession of the non-analytical cessation, which is the mere non-arising of future dharmas, the dharma that is the permanent obstruction to the arising of that which is free from contact.üîΩThe possession of that which is free from contact is the possession of the non-analytical cessation, which is the mere non-arising of future dharmas, the dharma that is the permanent obstruction to the arising of that which is free from contact.üîΩThe possession of that which is free from contact is the possession of the non-analytical cessation, which is the mere non-arising of future dharmas, the dharma that is the permanent obstruction to the arising of that which is free from contact.üîΩThe possession of that which is free from contact is the possession of the non-analytical cessation, which is the mere non-arising of future dharmas, the dharma that is the permanent obstruction to the arising of that which is free from contact.

original: de med pa ni skye ba la sogs pa 'dus byas kyi mtshan nyid dang mi ldan pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de med pa ni skye ba la sogs pa 'dus byas kyi mtshan nyid dang mi ldan pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The possession of that which is free from contact is the possession of the non-analytical cessation, which is the mere non-arising of future dharmas, the dharma that is the permanent

original: mdo las ni skye mched drug rnam par gzhag pa las lus kyi dbang po'i mjug thogs su yid kyi dbang po bshad pa la /
analyzed: mdo las ni skye mched drug rnam par gzhag pa las lus kyi dbang po'i mjug thogs su yid kyi dbang po bshad pa la /
translated: The s≈´tras explain the mental faculty immediately after the body faculty in the context of presenting the six sense faculties.

original: chos mngon pa ba rnams kyis ni rnam pa ston pa dag tu ches bde blag tu bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: chos mngon pa ba rnams kyis ni rnam pa ston pa dag tu ches bde blag tu bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: Abhidharma masters, in order to teach the faculties in a way that is easy to understand,

original: yang dmigs pa rnams 'don pa'i go rims gcig tu byas te /
analyzed: yang dmigs pa rnams 'don pa'i go rims gcig tu byas te /
translated: present the faculties in a single order, beginning with the faculties that possess objects.

original: de nas dmigs pa dang bcas pa'i dang por yid kyi dbang po bstan to //
analyzed: de nas dmigs pa dang bcas pa'i dang por yid kyi dbang po bstan to //
translated: Therefore they explain the mental faculty first.

original: de la zhes bya ba ni nye bar 'god pa'i tshig ste /
analyzed: de la zhes bya ba ni nye bar 'god pa'i tshig ste /
translated: The phrase ‚Äúin that regard‚Äù is a term that introduces a topic.

original: dbang po gang dag bshad @139a * //
analyzed: dbang po gang dag bshad @139a * //
translated: Among the faculties that have been explained,

original: pa la / chos kyi khams kyi phyogs gcig yin pa'i phyir chos kyi phyed ces bya'o //
analyzed: pa la / chos kyi khams kyi phyogs gcig yin pa'i phyir chos kyi phyed ces bya'o //
translated: the first half of the element of mental objects is called the ‚Äúhalf of the element of mental objects‚Äù because it is a portion of the element of mental objects.

original: srog gi dbang po la sogs pa bcu gcig dang zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: srog gi dbang po la sogs pa bcu gcig dang zhes bya ba la /
translated: The eleven faculties beginning with the life faculty.

original: srog gi dbang po dang / tshor ba'i dbang po lnga dang / dang po la sogs pa lnga'o //
analyzed: srog gi dbang po dang / tshor ba'i dbang po lnga dang / dang po la sogs pa lnga'o //
translated: The life faculty, the five faculties of sensation, and the first five faculties of the five spiritual faculties.

original: cha zhes bya ba ni kun shes ldan pa'i dbang po la sogs par bzung ba'i cha dad pa la sogs pa lnga dang / bde ba dang yid bde ba dang btang snyoms kyi dbang po rnams te /
analyzed: cha zhes bya ba ni kun shes ldan pa'i dbang po la sogs par bzung ba'i cha dad pa la sogs pa lnga dang / bde ba dang yid bde ba dang btang snyoms kyi dbang po rnams te /
translated: The term ‚Äúpart‚Äù refers to the five faculties of faith, etc., and the faculties of pleasure, mental pleasure, and equanimity, which are included in the faculty of understanding all, etc.

original: de la gsum gyi cha ni dbang po brgyad po de rnams su bshad do //
analyzed: de la gsum gyi cha ni dbang po brgyad po de rnams su bshad do //
translated: Three parts are explained as eight faculties.üîΩThe remaining faculties will be explained later.

original: 'og nas 'chad do zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: 'og nas 'chad do zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The male and female faculties are explained in the verse:

original: lus las pho dang mo dbang dag ;üîΩ/ ces bya ba de nas so //
analyzed: lus las pho dang mo dbang dag ; / ces bya ba de nas so //
translated: The male and female faculties are in the body.

original: lhag mi khams lnga po dag ces bya ba ni gzugs la sogs pa rnams so //
analyzed: lhag mi khams lnga po dag ces bya ba ni gzugs la sogs pa rnams so //
translated: The remaining five elements are the elements of form, etc.

original: chos kyi khams kyi phyogs gcig ni dbang po ma yin pa zhes bya ba ni dbang po bcu gcig ma gtogs pa rnams so //üîΩslob dpon btsun ba blo gros brtan pas nye bar bkod pa chos mngon pa mdzod kyi bshad pa'i rgya cher 'grel pa don gyi de nyid ces bya ba las gnas dang po rdzogs so /
analyzed: chos kyi khams kyi phyogs gcig ni dbang po ma yin pa zhes bya ba ni dbang po bcu gcig ma gtogs pa rnams so //üîΩslob dpon btsun ba blo gros brtan pas nye bar bkod pa chos mngon pa mdzod kyi bshad pa'i rgya cher 'grel pa don gyi de nyid ces bya ba las gnas dang po rdzogs so /
translated: One part of the element of mental objects is not a faculty. This refers to those elements that are not included in the eleven faculties.

original: // / sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: // / sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the Buddha.

original: dbang po rnams bshad pa la zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: dbang po rnams bshad pa la zhes bya ba la /
translated: The faculties have been explained.

original: khams kyi mdzod kyi mthar bsdus pa dang rab tu dbye ba'i sgo nas te /
analyzed: khams kyi mdzod kyi mthar bsdus pa dang rab tu dbye ba'i sgo nas te /
translated: In the Treasury of Elements, they are summarized and classified.

original: chos kyi phyed dang gang dag ni //
analyzed: chos kyi phyed dang gang dag ni //
translated: The half of the elements that are phenomena

original: bcu gnyis nang gir bshad dbang po //
analyzed: bcu gnyis nang gir bshad dbang po //
translated: and the twelve that are internal are called faculties.

original: zhes bya ba ni bsdus pas so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni bsdus pas so //
translated: This is the summary.

original: mig gi dbang po nas kun shes ldan pa'i dbang po dang zhes bya ba'i bar ni rab tu dbye bas so //
analyzed: mig gi dbang po nas kun shes ldan pa'i dbang po dang zhes bya ba'i bar ni rab tu dbye bas so //
translated: The classification is from the eye faculty to the faculty possessing complete knowledge.

original: de ltar dbang po bshad pa la //
analyzed: de ltar dbang po bshad pa la //
translated: Thus, the faculties have been explained.

original: dbang po'i don mi shes pas de'i phyir dbang po'i don ci zhe na zhes smras so //
analyzed: dbang po'i don mi shes pas de'i phyir dbang po'i don ci zhe na zhes smras so //
translated: Since the meaning of the faculties is not known, therefore it is asked, ‚ÄúWhat is the meaning of the faculties?‚Äù

original: 'di ni sgra'i don gyi dbang du byas nas dris pa yin gyi dngos po'i don ni ma yin te /
analyzed: 'di ni sgra'i don gyi dbang du byas nas dris pa yin gyi dngos po'i don ni ma yin te /
translated: This is asked from the perspective of the meaning of the term, not the meaning of the thing.

original: dngos po phan tshun tha dad pa rnams la don tha mi dad pa nye bar bzung nas sgra 'jug pa ni mi rigs te /
analyzed: dngos po phan tshun tha dad pa rnams la don tha mi dad pa nye bar bzung nas sgra 'jug pa ni mi rigs te /
translated: It is illogical for a term to engage in things that are mutually different while holding the meaning as undifferentiated.

original: ha cang thal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ha cang thal ba'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because it would lead to absurd consequences.

original: dngos po'i don ni mig la sogs pa pho'i dbang po drug po 'ga' zhig ni mdzod kyi gnas dang po kho nar bstan la /
analyzed: dngos po'i don ni mig la sogs pa pho'i dbang po drug po 'ga' zhig ni mdzod kyi gnas dang po kho nar bstan la /
translated: The meaning of the term is as follows: the six male faculties, eye, etc., are taught in the first chapter of the Abhidharmako≈õa.

original: srog gi dbang po ni ldan pa ma yin pa rnams kyi nang nas 'chad do //
analyzed: srog gi dbang po ni ldan pa ma yin pa rnams kyi nang nas 'chad do //
translated: The faculty of life force is taught among the dissociated factors.

original: dad pa la sogs pa rnams ni sems las byung ba rnams kyi nang nas so //

original: mdzes pa ni gzung bar bya ba'i ngo bo nyid do //

translated: Because those who are not blind and those who are not deaf are suitable as supports, they control the beautification of the body.
